landing.headline: Do you ever feel this way?
landing.empathy1: Sometimes you can't quite say why you chose that way, or why you're so tired.
landing.empathy2: It's not about fortune-telling—you just want to understand yourself a bit more.
landing.serviceIntro: Here we don't label you; we use the language of the chart to look at the rhythm and flow of your life with you.

blog.title: Articles
blog.subtitle: Rediscover yourself through the language of destiny.
blog.ctaText: Curious about your chart? Check your reading for free.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.collectBody: When you use the chart reading feature, we receive the birth date, birth time, and gender you enter. This data is used only for real-time chart calculation and is not stored on our servers or shared with any third parties.
privacy.cookieBody: This website may use cookies to support Google AdSense advertising. These cookies are managed by Google and are used to serve relevant ads based on your browsing behavior. You can manage or disable cookies in your browser settings.
privacy.thirdPartyBody: This website uses Google AdSense for advertising. Google may show you relevant ads based on your visits to this site or other websites. For more information or to opt out of personalized advertising, visit the Google Ads settings page.
privacy.changesBody: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with the updated date.

about.title: About This Service
about.purposeBody: The core of this service is not 'telling your fortune' but 'helping you understand yourself.' Through the language of BaZi (Chinese astrology), we offer a perspective to rediscover your energy structure, personality tendencies, and life rhythm. This is not prediction — it is understanding.
about.approachBody: BaZi astrology is based on your birth year, month, day, and time. Through the interaction of Heavenly Stems, Earthly Branches, and the Five Elements, it reveals your innate energy distribution. What we do is translate this ancient language into modern, accessible readings — giving you one more lens to understand yourself when facing life's choices.
about.disclaimerBody: All content provided by this service is reference-based interpretation grounded in BaZi astrology and does not constitute medical, legal, financial, or life decision advice of any kind. Chart readings cannot predict specific events or outcomes. Please use this service as a supplementary tool for self-understanding, and consult relevant professionals for important decisions.
